tweet: We're excited to announce our partnership with @marketprotocol to enable off-chain asset trading. MARKET Protocol will be using Chainlink to enable derivatives traders to create highly complex derivatives #smartcontracts!  https://t.co/dYCjoOi4vT

MARKET Protocol is especially excited to announce its latest partnership with @chainlink, the industry leader in #decentralized #oracle networks and securely providing data to #smartcontracts!    https://t.co/sgQcubeDVb
Read about our partnership with @chainlink and the role of "middleware" in the evolution of smart contracts in this piece from @bitsonlinecom  https://t.co/cJ49PvuVsO
$LINK now in the top 60 spot on CMC. I remember during the bull run (Dec- Jan) it was barely top 100. Bear market is the transfer from overvalued to undervalued project
Exciting to see @MarketProtocol partnering with @chainlink to facilitate their derivatives trading. We're looking forward to our nodes helping in the retrieval of all that required data!

Marketprotocol announces partnership with @chainlink. Marketprotocol is a decentralized derivatives protocol that's working with @MakerDAO, the only stablecoin that is collaterized with assets via #smartcontracts. #chainlink #decentralizedoracles #smartoracles #oracles #api
